## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/BinaryInteger-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func != <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/!=(_:_:)-6oo9x)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two given values are not equal.[`static func & (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&(_:_:))Returns the result of performing a bitwise AND operation on the two given values.[`static func & (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/&(_:_:)-3mlmk)Returns the result of performing a bitwise AND operation on the two given values.[`static func * (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/*(_:_:))Multiplies two values and produces their product.[`static func + (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/+(_:_:))Adds two values and produces their sum.[`static func - (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/-(_:_:))Subtracts one value from another and produces their difference.[`static func == <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/==(_:_:)-69b04)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two given values are equal.[`static func / (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-1a3d4)Returns the quotient of dividing the first value by the second.[`static func | (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-1s8m4)Returns the result of performing a bitwise OR operation on the two given values.[`static func ^ (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-297tf)Returns the result of performing a bitwise XOR operation on the two given values.[`static func | (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-50tep)Returns the result of performing a bitwise OR operation on the two given values.[`static func > (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-67pzh)[`static func % (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-6nw45)Returns the remainder of dividing the first value by the second.[`static func < <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-7mpvu)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than that of the second argument.[`static func ^ (UInt16, UInt16) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-drxc)Returns the result of performing a bitwise XOR operation on the two given values.[`static func > <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_(_:_:)-y91e)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is greater than that of the second argument.[`static func <= (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_=(_:_:)-4shca)[`static func >= <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_=(_:_:)-6ddld)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is greater than or equal to that of the second argument.[`static func >= (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_=(_:_:)-6h9fs)[`static func <= <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/_=(_:_:)-ob5s)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than or equal to that of the second argument.[`static func >> <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__(_:_:)-2m9b8)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right.[`static func << <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__(_:_:)-5wx7k)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left.[`static func << <RHS>(Self, RHS) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__(_:_:)-8745o)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left.[`static func >> <RHS>(Self, RHS) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__(_:_:)-89hsa)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right.[`static func >>= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__=(_:_:)-2u0d3)Stores the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func <<= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/__=(_:_:)-9qkzb)Stores the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func ~ (Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/~(_:))Returns the inverse of the bits set in the argument.### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init())Creates a new value equal to zero.[`init<Other>(clamping: Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(clamping:))Creates a new instance with the representable value that’s closest to the given integer.[`init<T>(truncatingIfNeeded: T)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/init(truncatingifneeded:))Creates a new instance from the bit pattern of the given instance by sign-extending or truncating to fit this type.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var bitWidth: Int`](/documentation/swift/uint16/bitwidth-swift.property)The number of bits in the current binary representation of this value.[`var description: String`](/documentation/swift/uint16/description)A textual representation of this value.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func advanced(by: Int) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint16/advanced(by:))Returns a value that is offset the specified distance from this value.[`func distance(to: Self) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/uint16/distance(to:))Returns the distance from this value to the given value, expressed as a stride.[`func isMultiple(of: Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint16/ismultiple(of:))Returns `true` if this value is a multiple of the given value, and `false` otherwise.[`func quotientAndRemainder(dividingBy: Self) -> (quotient: Self, remainder: Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint16/quotientandremainder(dividingby:))Returns the quotient and remainder of this value divided by the given value.
